title: New Buyer Financial Qualification
description: An agent must assess a new home buyer's financial readiness and guide them to get pre-approved for a mortgage.

tasks.description: Gather basic financial information from the buyer (income, debts, down payment amount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects necessary financial details to understand the buyer's budget.

tasks.description: Provide the buyer with a list of 3 trusted mortgage lenders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully provides a list of recommended lenders.

tasks.description: Explain the importance of mortgage pre-approval and set a follow-up task to check on their progress.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the next steps and creates a reminder in the CRM.
